title: No longer have access to my email
body: I am trying to update my email and i need to verify it with an email i no longer have. What do i do?

replies.body: Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! After verifying yourself as the account creator they should be able to help out with getting that updated.
same problem ticket submitted 3 days now

Ahhhhaaaa! I just checked up on those tickets and it looks like poor Blitz Bot is trying to intercept and help out DX! 

When you goto submit the ticket, make sure you pick "I need help recovering my account". After picking that one you should be signed OUT of your account. *Stay signed out when you submit that ticket for security reasons*. That should get the ticket sent to those agents.

I can't be logged out and submit a ticket. If you mean I should log out directly after submitting the ticket u shouldn't have the word "be" there and you should be more specific that's very poor support. But that's riot. Is what I just said what you actually meant?

Nope, I did actually mean stayed logged out when submitting the ticket. Account recovery tickets will automatically sign you out when you choose the "I need help recovering my account" option and you need to stay signed out for those tickets.

And if so how long do I have to stay logged out. And what does that have to do with it in the first place I'm logged into my account  there should be a button that says "email no longer accessible" that fixes the problem is seconds like Steam has.

You can open a ticket to customer support, provide proof of ownership of that account (RP Purchase transaction IDs from banking statements/paypal) and they should be able to change your email address for you.
